A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was breathtaking. Fabulous. Couldn't have asked for better. \nI see there is a lot of negativity from some fans on this page\, but I think they are just disappointed in the change and new direction\, or perhaps things didnt go their way exactly? \nThe action was incredible\, so too was the romance\, mythology\, and story. Lucas films has not failed to amaze. Im going to see it again!
